thread.title_full: Great base for exploring NY in the heart of midtown. - Review of Hyatt Centric Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rick O
title: Great base for exploring NY in the heart of midtown.
text: Beautiful views from the rooftop bar; clean, modern rooms and a location steps from the heart of Times Square made this hotel a great value. The hotel is steps from dining options of all kinds and theater. Convenient to 5th Ave. shopping and Rockefeller Center.
